The issue is related to Jackson XML dependencies missing. The problem is that the test is trying to start a full Spring Boot application context with web support, which requires XML message converters. This is a common issue when upgrading Spring Boot. We need to add the jackson-dataformat-xml dependency. Let me add it to the example-eureka-server pom.xml:
